turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, would you be able to pick me up a coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Where would you like me to go?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think the Starbucks on 11th Ave should be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great. Would you like a hot drink or an iced one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking hot for today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. What kind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in the mood for an Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Any extra flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't think so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's fine. Do you want milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what kind.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It has to be almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will make sure. Will you want whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great. Anything else I should specify?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. I placed the order with Starbucks on 11th ave in Greeley. You should be able to pick it up shortly. Be on the lookout for a text receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a lot!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.
